tactic: intros aP R Q HOBuch a Hin; apply red_incl with (b:=a) (q:=R); auto.
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable b (possible names are: A, A0, A1, eqA, plusA, invA, minusA, multA, divA, eqA_dec, n, ltM, ltM_dec, a, p and q).

original: intros aP R Q HOBuch a Hin; apply red_incl with (b:=a) (q:=R); auto.
